sub_title: EMEA & LATAM, Marketing Programs Manager CSP & Partner, Prisma Cloud at Palo Alto Networks
summary:
Entrepreneurial international marketing and communication manager, with proven track record (15+ years) of successfully delivering marketing, sales and innovation in multiple industries, in global companies of Services, ICT, Banking.

Leveraging my expertise as Entrepreneur, Lobbyist, PR manager, Marketing manager, I am able to efficiently deal with multiple stakeholders inside and outside the company, and deliver projects with success.
 
I fluently speak English, French, and have a basic command of German and Russian. When I do not work, I enjoy playing trumpet.
